messages.content: Pomfy is a set of custom nodes for ComfyUI that enable two-way data synchronization between Photoshop and ComfyUI.
What is the purpose of Pomfy?
Pomfy allows for sending and receiving data between Photoshop and ComfyUI using custom nodes.
Is the Pomfy Photoshop Plugin required for using the custom Pomfy nodes?
Yes, the [Pomfy Photoshop Plugin](https://github.com/Millyarde/Pomfy-Plugin) is required to use Pomfy's custom nodes.
Is the Pomfy plugin currently functional?
No, the Pomfy plugin is still being developed and does not work yet.
